vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H4155', 'matchingForm': 'מוּעָף', 'stepTransliteration': 'mu.aph', 'gloss': 'gloom', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '幽暗', '_es_Gloss': 'oscuridad', '_zh_Gloss': '幽暗'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4588', 'matchingForm': 'מָעוּף', 'stepTransliteration': 'ma.uph', 'gloss': 'gloom', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '幽暗', '_es_Gloss': 'oscuridad', '_zh_Gloss': '幽暗'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5774B', 'matchingForm': 'תְּעֻפָה', 'stepTransliteration': 'te.u.phah', 'gloss': 'gloom', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '飛, 飛去', '_es_Gloss': 'voló', '_zh_Gloss': '飞, 飞去'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5775', 'matchingForm': 'עוֹף', 'stepTransliteration': 'oph', 'gloss': 'bird', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '飛鳥', '_es_Gloss': 'aves', '_zh_Gloss': '飞鸟'}, {'strongNumber': 'H5890', 'matchingForm': 'עֵיפָה', 'stepTransliteration': 'e.phah', 'gloss': 'darkness', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '那昏暗, 黑暗', '_es_Gloss': 'oscuridad', '_zh_Gloss': '那昏暗, 黑暗'}, {'strongNumber': 'H6079', 'matchingForm': 'עַפְעַף', 'stepTransliteration': 'aph.aph', 'gloss': 'eyelid', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '眼皮, 眼皮上', '_es_Gloss': 'párpados', '_zh_Gloss': '眼皮, 眼皮上'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
v
1) to fly, fly about, fly away
1a)(Qal)
1a1) to fly, hover
1a2) to fly away
1b) (Hiphil) to cause to fly, light upon
1c) (Polel)
1c1) to fly about or to and fro
1c2) to cause to fly to and fro, brandish
1d) (Hithpolel) to fly away
2) (Qal) to cover, be dark
§ v
1) to fly, fly about, fly away
1a)(Qal)
1a1) to fly, hover
1a2) to fly away
1b) (Hiphil) to cause to fly, light upon
1c) (Polel)
1c1) to fly about or to and fro
1c2) to cause to fly to and fro, brandish
1d) (Hithpolel) to fly away
2) (Qal) to cover, be dark
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1a) qal   volar; (1b) pol.   volar alrededor, sobrevolar; (1c) hitp.   volar; (1d) hif.   hacer volar; (2) qal   estar oscuro
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
動詞
1) 飛, 飛翔, 飛走
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 飛, 盤旋
1a2) 飛離
1b) (Hiphil) 飛去,
1c) (Polel)
1c1) 飛來飛去 (創 1:20; 賽 6:2)
1c2) 使其飛來飛去, 揮舞 (結 32:10)
1d) (Hithpolel) 飛走 (何 9:11)
2) (Qal) 黑暗 (伯 11:17)
陰性名詞
3) 陰暗
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
动词
1) 飞, 飞翔, 飞走
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 飞, 盘旋
1a2) 飞离
1b) (Hiphil) 飞去,
1c) (Polel)
1c1) 飞来飞去 (创 1:20; 赛 6:2)
1c2) 使其飞来飞去, 挥舞 (结 32:10)
1d) (Hithpolel) 飞走 (何 9:11)
2) (Qal) 黑暗 (伯 11:17)
阴性名词
3) 阴暗
